summary: This is a brief email correspondence from August 12, 2021, regarding the scheduling of a video meeting related to the Epstein case. The sender informs the recipient that a prosecutor on the case has been copied and will be sending a meeting invitation.

events.title: Video Meeting Scheduling Email
events.description: An email is sent to schedule a video meeting for the following week regarding the Epstein case. The sender notes that a prosecutor on the case has been copied and will send the official invitation.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 12, 2021, concerning the Epstein case.
It references a scheduled video meeting for the following week.
A prosecutor on the case is involved in sending the meeting invitation.
The document is part of the EFTA00155495 file in Data Set 9.
